questions.quote: Hey, wait a second. Wait a second. ! Celebrate! How about some champagne?
Excuse me - I can't seem to find my car - do you think you could drive me...
U-oh come on up.  It's Elaine you don't have a problem with her do you?
Oh, so important. So what are you doing uh Thursday night? You wanna have dinner?
Um, what was that last thing you gave me? That was pretty good.
Actually, yeah.  Wait a second! Is that the fork that fell on the floor?!  Are you using the fork that fell on the floor?!
I was engaged to Mickey Rooney! He left me at the altar. Kramer! Kramer!
This is excellent huh? Don't worry I didn't use too much milk, cause I know we gotta make it last.
So, the meeting with Lippman is all set. He's the editor-in-chief! I think because of your request-
'The Other Side Of Darkness'. Huh, I never heard of that one.
